TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit MustRunInClientContextAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class MustRunInClientContextAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class MustRunInClientContextAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 如有可能，强制在创建者的上下文中创建特性化的对象。

span.span: Forces the attributed object to be created in the context of the creator, if possible.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果特性化的对象的上下文特性与相冲突的创建者，上下文尝试创建对象时引发。If the context attributes of the attributed object conflict with those of the context of the creator, a is thrown when an attempt is made to create the object. 有关使用属性的详细信息，请参阅[属性](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md)。For more information about using attributes, see [Attributes](~/docs/standard/attributes/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将类型。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type.
